site-address: Civic And Cultural Quarter, Waterdale
ownership: owned by a public authority
notes:
"08/02535/OUTA - This is a large mixed use Outline permission, a significant proportion has now come forward with Reserved Matters and indeed built. There is a 1ha site (Scarborough House) identified for residential uses that has not yet had Reserved Matters.  Although this site has been temporary greened over, it previosuly contained Council Offices and car parking so is considered to be Brownfield. The capacity in this register reflects this part of the scheme only. Other residential elements are under construction (see 12/02500/REMM) and the original capacity of 450 units is no longer expected to materialise with a revised total of 130 units now expected"
"Mixed Use Civic & Cultural Quarter comprising new performance venue, public library, civic offices, A1/A2/A3/A4 retail, B1 offices, D2 leisure, C1 hotels and C3 residential and open space"

There are several planning approvals for this site (06/03071/OUTM; 11/01077/REMM;14/00616/FULM). The original Outline permission included proposals for a wider mixed use development, but viability issues has subsequently resulted in further approvals for just additional residential uses. The site has had planning permission implemented (development platform created), but that scheme is no longer being delivered and no houses have been built. Likely that a fresh application will be required therefore.
